channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: Gustavo Landfried is developing the Computational Social Science area in one of the main scientific centers of Latin America. As a Social Anthropologist, he is currently finishing a PhD in Computer Science. His work is focused on studying how people learn in cultural evolution contexts, exploiting the virtually infinite repository of human behavior available in Internet. Additionally, he is leading a large group of young anthropologists, who have already begun to train in mathematics and computational science.
